Articles.Content:
This is simply a collection of all servers people have created for Kessler along with number of ships for you to easily find a server and find the right ship density for your computer.

Servers:

Test Server: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9344.0

host orias.homeip.net, port 8988, password kesslertest

Part count: MY EYES, THEY BURN(I don\'t know the number, but it is a HECKTON)

SynMonger Test server: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9344.0

host sashimi.synmonger.com, port 8988, no password

Part count:

Roleplay server(IICT): http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10075.0
